author: billbarker
msg: Relaxing the restrictions on creating Valve MBeans.

There is no functional change for Catalina Valves.  For custom Valves, they only need to implement 'Contained', not extend ValveBase.  At the very least, throwing a checked-exception is much better then throwing the non-checked "ClassCastException".

author: hgomez
msg: No timeout to be set in AJP13 connector, it's the webserver

msg: Check for the existence of the file.

msg: Add to configure how JNDI should handle referrals returned by the server.
